system.effect: Prerequisites: All Mew Major Gifts Activate Once/10 - Extended Action Target: Your Pokémon with at least 3 Tutor Points Effect: Your Pokémon loses 3 Tutor Points and may  make use of any TM or Tutoring effect to learn a  single Move regardless of what it is normally capable  of learning. It must still pay any Tutor Point costs for  this effect. You may only target a Pokémon once with  Origin Tutor.
